content:
An ocean cruiser inexplicitly diverts from its course to land on an island. An announcement is heard that orders everyone to leave the boat immediately. Confused, they listen, following the emergency procedures and leaving their luggage behind. However, upon walking onto the beach, 3 things stand out. The boat does not seem to be in danger whatsoever, there are only 12 of them, and there’s a huge screen in front of them. It turns on, and the image of a man appears, smiling.
“WELCOME” he says, and the group wince as the sound blares across the island. “YOU TWELVE PEOPLE HAVE BEEN SELECTED AS CONTESTANTS OF A CERTAIN GAME. IT IS A GAME OF SURVIVAL. AMONG YOU ARE SEVERAL ASSASSINS I HAVE CHOSEN. THEY HAVE BEEN ORDERED TO KILL ONE PERSON AMONG YOU EACH NIGHT, AND IF THEY OUTNUMBER THE NONASSASSINS AT ANY TIME, THEY WILL KILL ALL PEOPLE ON THE ISLAND. YOUR GOAL IS TO FIND ALL OF THE ASSASSINS AND GET RID OF THEM. ANY PEOPLE THAT SURVIVE WHEN ALL ASSASSINS ARE DEAD WILL RECEIVE 100 MILLION DOLLARS EACH.”
The screen turned off. Everyone looked at each other uneasily. Some were fazed by the large amount of money, others looked at everyone else suspiciously, and yet others assumed this was a joke and started walking back towards the ship. However, the screen turned on again and the volume was much more standable. “And by the way, in case anyone thinks they can leave with the boat they came in.” He took out a remote and pressed the button. Multiple explosions went off on the ship at once, instantly reducing the ship to scrap which sunk. Several people were blown back, but thankfully no one was hurt.
“And there you have it, now GOOD LUCK AND HAPPY MURDERING”

Spoiler: rules
Game Rules (copied and altered slightly from Nexus)
Rule 0: Don't be a jerk. - If you are being a jerk, you run the risk of force-replacement or modkill. You may or may not be warned.

General:
- Please adhere to the site rules.
- Do not discuss this game of mafia outside of this thread unless your role PM allows you to do so.
- Day phases will last 3 weeks maximum.
- Night Phases will last 72 hours maximum.
- During night phase, no talking may be done in the thread.
- Do not quote PM's from the mod at all (real or fabricated). Paraphrasing is acceptable.
- If you have any questions about your role, or the game, feel free to PM the mod.

Voting/Player Actions:
- All votes must be in bold format: vote: Nexus for example.
- Try to unvote before voting. Unvotes must also be in bold.
- You may not vote for people that are dead or nonexistent.
- You may vote No Lynch.
- Voting tricks are not acceptable. If you misspell someone's name intentionally, but I get the gist of it, the vote will count.
- A lynch will occur once a majority decision is reached. If no majority is reached by deadline, then no lynch shall occur.
- Following a lynch, it is twilight. You may continue to post until I lock the thread and declare it night.
- If you are killed, one Bah! type post is permitted. No game related information must be relayed during them, however.
- If you have a Night Action, you may submit it during Night 1 and each subsequent Night. No other time.

Activity:
- You are expected to post at least once every 72 hours. If you haven't posted for 72 hours, I shall prod you. If you do not respond to the prod within 48 hours (either in thread if it's Day, or via PM during the Night) then I may replace you.
- Similarly, if you require more than three prods, I will force-replace you.

Mechanics:
- Red is my colour. Please don't use it.
- Confirm by how your Role PM tells you to once you are ready to play. Once there are 10 confirms, the game begins.
- Do not edit your posts.
- No impossible/hard to read text, or cryptography.
- The Mod may make mistakes - please point out any mistakes gently. Mistakes will be corrected where possible, but sometimes mistakes are made that cannot be reversed. These will stand as final to be commiserated over after the game.
- If there is a hydra in the game, you must not post in your normal account. Doing so and then not quoting it as a hydra will invite a warning. Excessive failure to post as a hydra and not quoting it will result in force-replacement.
- If you need to get the mod's attention, either PM me, or bold the text you wish to draw to my attention.
- I reserve the right to alter/remove/add any rules as I see fit. You will, of course, be notified if that happens, however.
